[Unit]
Description=Tarantool app customEnvName.default
After=network.target

[Service]
Type=forking
ExecStart=/usr/bin/tt -L /path/cfg/tt.yaml start
Restart=on-failure
RestartSec=2
User=tarantool
Group=tarantool

LimitCORE=infinity
# Disable OOM killer
OOMScoreAdjust=-1000
# Increase fd limit for Vinyl
LimitNOFILE=2048

# Systemd waits until all xlogs are recovered
TimeoutStartSec=86400s
# Give a reasonable amount of time to close xlogs
TimeoutStopSec=10s

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target
Alias=customEnvName
